name: Root Grower
description:
This game was made for Global Game Jam 2023.

Theme - Roots

Root Grower is a game about controlling plant roots to help it grow. You need to collect various minerals for the plant to grow and water for the plant to survive. You will also need to avoid worms.

How to play:

- Move mouse to control roots

- Collect water to stay alive

- Collect minerals to grow

- Avoid worms
